      SchemaBuilder.FieldAssembler<R> SchemaBuilder.FieldAssembler.nullableBoolean(String fieldName, boolean defaultVal)
      Shortcut for creating a nullable boolean field: a union of boolean and null with an boolean default.
      SchemaBuilder.FieldAssembler<R> SchemaBuilder.FieldAssembler.nullableBytes(String fieldName, byte[] defaultVal)
